Headline: Loop-bound Brown Line Service Delayed at Western
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Brown Line trains are standing at Western due to a mechanical problem. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Brown Line trains are standing at Western due to a mechanical problem. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
